headline.main: VAN MOOK CRITICIZES ALLIED WAR CONDUCT; He Asks Why U.S. Did Not Attack Foe's Lines 5 Weeks Ago

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Tuesday, March 3 (AP) -- A Daily Mail dispatch from Bandung said today the Netherlands Indies Lieutenant Governor, Hubertus J. Van Mook, was "bitterly criticizing" the United Nations Command in the Pacific and quoted him as saying "this has been a war of lost chances."
abstract: Dr H J van Mook scores Allied failure to take offensive
